purpose: Provides an open-source framework for building canvas-based applications with integrated database and UI components.
principle: Leverages Supabase for database management and Shadcn UI for user interface design, facilitating rapid development of canvas applications.
reusability: Modular design with plug-and-play components, allows integration with existing projects via APIs and UI components.
limitations: Currently in alpha stage, which may include incomplete features and potential stability issues.
name: grida
description: Open Source Canvas Framework - with ⚡️ Supabase + Shadcn UI Built-in
highlight: Integrates Supabase and Shadcn UI for a seamless canvas framework experience with no-code capabilities.
